metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38205 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: drivers/net/ethernet/xilinx/xilinx_emaclite.c in the Linux kernel before5.13.3 makes it easier for attackers to defeat an ASLR protection mechanismbecause it prints a kernel pointer (i.e., the real IOMEM pointer).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
